title: Syllabus
content:
Which subjects do we have  in 4th sem and what's their respective credits
For CSE branch.

comments.body:
Microprocessors and computer architecture (Mpca) - 5 credits

Computer networks (cn) - 5 credits

Operating system (os)- 4 credits

Design and analysis of algorithms - 4 credits

Linear algebra (la) -  4 credits
